content_descriptors.notes:
Contains multiple instances of sex with both male and female partners, including penetration. Scenes of transformation also often include suggestive imagery and sometimes nudity. Kinks featured include transformation, bondage, exhibitionism, sizeplay, femdom, hypnotism, and others.

Sex scenes can be skipped or prefaced with content warnings with the option to continue or summarize and skip. Nudity that occurs outside sex scenes can also be covered up.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 14.04
  • Processor: Intel Core 2
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OSX 10.10
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Compatible with OpenGL
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8.1/10 (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL capable GPU
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
